IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO ASSIST IN MAKING AVAILABLE ACCESSIBLE LEARNING OPPORTUNITIES FOR EVERYONE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: WORKING TOGETHER WITH EVERETT COMMUNITY COLLEGE, WE ASSIST IN MAKING AVAILABLE ACCESSIBLE LEARNING OPPORTUNITIES FOR EVERYONE. THROUGH OUR PARTNERSHIP, WE AWAKEN PEOPLE TO POSSIBILITY AND, THROUGH EDUCATION, ENABLE THEM TO ACHIEVE THEIR DREAMS.
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDED SCHOLARSHIPS TO APPROXIMATELY 196 STUDENTS UNDER SEVERAL PROGRAMS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: COLLEGE PROGRAM SUPPORT - SUPPORT OF VARIOUS INSTRUCTIONAL PROGRAMS AT EVERETT COMMUNITY COLLEGE. FOSTER CONTINUING PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT OF FACULTY AND STAFF SKILLS AND DEPTH OF KNOWLEDGE. FACILITATE EDUCATIONAL AND CULTURAL EVENTS AND FOSTER ALUMNI AND RETIREE RELATIONS. THESE ACTIVITIES SERVED FACULTY MEMBERS AND SUPPORTED OR PARTIALLY SUPPORTED CAMPUS ACTIVITIES THAT INVOLVED STUDENTS, PROSPECTIVE STUDENTS, AND COMMUNITY MEMBERS THROUGHOUT THE YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION MAINTAINS SEVERAL COLLECTIONS CONSISTING OF ARTWORK, GEOLOGICAL ITEMS, AND HISTORICAL TREASURES. THE COLLECTIONS ARE MAINTAINED FOR EDUCATIONAL, RESEARCH, SCIENTIFIC, AND CURATORIAL PURPOSES.
THE ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE USED FOR SCHOLARSHIP AND COLLEGE PROGRAM SUPPORT.

THE FOUNDATION'S TAX FILINGS ARE SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY TAXING AUTHORITIES, GENERALLY FOR THREE YEARS AFTER THE RETURN IS FILED. THE FOUNDATION WOULD RECOGNIZE ACCRUED INTEREST AND PENALTIES ASSOCIATED WITH UNCERTAIN TAX PROVISIONS, IF ANY, AS PART OF ADMINISTRATION EXPENSES IN THE STATEMENTS OF FUNCTIONAL EXPENSES.

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: SUPPORT FOR COLLEGE PROGRAMS AND STUDENT SCHOLARSHIPS

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GRANTS - PROVIDE SUPPORT TO COLLEGE PROGRAMS, STAFF, AND FACULTY. FUNDS ARE DISTRIBUTED ON A REIMBURSEMENT BASIS. SCHOLARSHIPS - PROVIDE FINANCIAL SUPPORT TO STUDENTS. APPLICATIONS ARE REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY THE SCHOLARSHIP COMMITTEE.

BusTrInvolveInterestedPrsnGrp.TransactionDesc: BANKING. THE FOUNDATION HAS ACCOUNTS AT THE BANK WHERE THE BOARD MEMBER IS EMPLOYED.
BANKING. THE FOUNDATION HAS ACCOUNTS AT THE BANK WHERE THE BOARD MEMBER IS EMPLOYED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE BOARD PRIOR TO SUBMISSION TO THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BOARD MEMBERS HAVE ON FILE AN INFORMATION SHEET WITH A CONFLICT DISCLOSURE SHEET THAT OUTLINES ANY POTENTIAL INTERESTS THAT COULD GIVE RISE TO CONFLICTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
